articles.author: Joseph Zucker
articles.title: Caitlin Clark Declines to Discuss Fever-Sun Fight, 'Let's Talk About Basketball' - Bleacher Report
articles.description: Indiana Fever star Caitlin Clark declined to address the on-court extracurriculars during Tuesday's 88-71 win over the Connecticut Sun.
articles.content:
Indiana Fever star Caitlin Clark declined to address the on-court extracurriculars during Tuesday's 88-71 win over the Connecticut Sun.
"You guys came for basketball; let's talk about basketball," s… [+2024 chars]
